commit.message:
Next (#33)

2.0.1-alpha.1
Require node >=14

Update melinda-rest-api-commons to v8

Update dependencies

Use separate Mongo tables/collections for prio and bulk

Use job-specific Amqp queues ('operation.correlationId') instead of generic Amqp queues ('operation')

Use queueItemState QUEUEING_IN_PROGRESS

Change queueItemState VALIDATOR.IN_QUEUE to IMPORTER.IN_QUEUE

Update queueItemStates
** Use state QUEUEING_IN_PROGRESS
** Change VALIDATOR.IN_QUEUE to IMPORTER.IN_QUEUE

Update checkQueue to use combined checkQueue styles and toRecord parameter

updated error handling and queue item states (updated error handling and queue item states #34)

Fix handled id list (Fix handled id list #36)

Catch errors from unserializing record(s)

Error if SRU doesn't return a record

Better error handling

Do not use ackNReplyMessages for errors

Put noop validationMessages to mongo

Add comments

Add tidier debug logging

Update readme

Add npm and node-version badges to readme

Split app/checkAmqp function that had too many statements

Split interfaces/validator/index/process function that had too many statements

Remove unnecessary eslint-disables

Co-authored-by: Joni Ollila 53558796+natlibfi-jonollil@users.noreply.github.com
